general.missing_permission: I need the **%1$s** permission in this **%2$s** to continue!
general.missing_user_permission: You need the **%1$s** permission in this **%2$s** to continue!
general.guild_only: This command **can only be used** within servers.
general.missing_argument: It appears the required argument **%1$s** is missing; check the **command usage** and try again.
general.owner_only: This command **can only be used** by **bot owners**. Nice try.
general.command_exception: Hm, it appears as if **something strange** has happened. Apologies.
general.cooldown: Woah there! You need to wait another %1$ss before doing that again.
general.page_prompt: Please respond with the page number you would like to jump to:
general.blocked:
**%1$s** has been **blocked** from using this feature for reason: **%2$s**.
*This message will serve as your notification and you will not receive another.*

cat.error: Sadly, something appears to have **gone wrong** while fetching the cat.

dog.error: Sadly, something appears to have **gone wrong** while fetching the doggo.

help.description: View some basic quick-start information about the bot
help.not_found: Whoops, a command with that name **does not exist**. Try using **%1$scommands** to find what you're looking for.
help.available_subcommands: It looks like that subcommand **does not exist** for this command, however you can try any of these: %1$s
help.required_arguments: Any arguments that are enclosed with <> are required.

info_embed.title: Sandra's Website
info_embed.description: I was created by %1$s, %2$s, and %3$s; with art by [%4$s](%5$s).
info_embed.invite_content: > Would you like me in **your server**? **[Click to invite me](%1$s)**.

ping.description: Sends a ping to test Sandra's connection to Discord
ping.response: It took me %1$s to **ping Discord** and about %2$s to **receive your message**.
